thread.title: BRIEF-Orthopediatrics Corp Q1 Loss Per Share $0.41

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Orthopediatrics Corp Q1 Loss Per Share $0.41
text:
May 14 (Reuters) - OrthoPediatrics Corp:
* Q1 LOSS PER SHARE $0.41 * Q1 REVENUE $12.1 MILLION VERSUS I/B/E/S VIEW $11.5 MILLION
* Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $-0.30 — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* AS OF MARCH 31, 2018, CASH AND CASH EQUIVALENTS WERE $34.6 MILLION, COMPARED TO $42.6 MILLION AS OF DECEMBER 31, 2017 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
